description:
Free OpenSource .Net Wrapper around un4seen Bass and most of its addons.
This project is currently in development.
You can contribute to it on GitHub.

Samples available on GitHub Repository

The Library is compiled for AnyCPU.
But the Bass dlls need to be checked for x64 or x86.
Put the Bass dlls in the same folder as ManagedBass.dll.
ManagedBass does not need to be licensed for Commercial use, but bass and many of the addons have to be.
Check the below website for more details
Bass dlls are available at http://www.un4seen.com/bass
Bass and its Addons are trademarks of their respective owners.
releaseNotes:
* Added ReverseUserChannel.
* Added PitchDSP.

* More XML Documentation.
* More BassException.

* Renamed Errors.DataNotAvailable to NotAvailable.
* Corrected Spelling: ChannelAttribute.ScannedInfo.

* Bass.SampleGetChannel: OnlyNew defaulted to false.
* Bass.SampleLoad added byte[] and float[] overloads.
* Bass.SampleGetChannels returns an int[] of size exactly no of channels.

* Manually implemented Offset parameters of CreateStream() IntPtr and byte[] overloads.
* CreateStream() removed short[], int[], float[] and Stream overloads.

* Effect and DSP classes implement INotifyPropertyChanged.
* Merged MemoryChannel into FileChannel.

* Changed EchoParameters.bStereo to int.

AudioSample
----------------------
* Does not inherit from Channel.
* Introduced method CreateChannel() which returns a Channel.
* File constructor Length and Offset parameters.
* Added int MaxPlaybacks in all constructors.

MediaPlayer and MediaPlayerFX
---------------------------------
* Fixed Errors.
* Auto-Init Current Device.
* Property Persistence between subsequent Loads.
* Implemented INotifyPropertyChanged.
summary: Free OpenSource .Net Wrapper for Un4seen Bass.
title: ManagedBass
